    • Method Detail

      • stretch

        public static <T extends ImageGray<T>> T stretch(T input,
                                                 double gamma,
                                                 double beta,
                                                 double max,
                                                 T output)

        Stretches the image's intensity:
        Ox,y = Ix,yγ + beta

        The image's intensity is clamped at 0 and max;

        Parameters:
        input - Input image. Not modified.
        output - If not null, the output image. If null a new image is declared and returned. Modified.
        Returns:
        Output image.

      • brighten

        public static <T extends ImageGray<T>> T brighten(T input,
                                                  double beta,
                                                  double max,
                                                  T output)

        Brightens the image's intensity:
        Ox,y = Ix,y + beta

        The image's intensity is clamped at 0 and max;

        Parameters:
        input - Input image. Not modified.
        beta - How much the image is brightened by.
        output - If not null, the output image. If null a new image is declared and returned. Modified.
        Returns:
        Output image.
